headline: Procedures That Modify A Precedent From 1999
abstract: The Senate Republican leader proposed impeachment trial rules that push the 1999 precedent toward President Trump’s preferences.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — For weeks, Senator Mitch McConnell sought to deflect charges that he was trying to stack the deck in favor of President Trump in his impeachment trial by repeating that he was merely replicating the Senate’s only modern precedent: the 1999 trial of President Bill Clinton.
keywords: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
